just energy transition.Description: Renewable energy plays a crucial role in achieving a just energy transition by reducing reliance on fossil fuels and decreasing greenhouse gas emissions.
Improving energy efficiency is an important aspect of a just energy transition as it reduces energy consumption and promotes sustainability.
Clean technology innovations are essential for a just energy transition as they provide sustainable alternatives to traditional energy sources.
A just energy transition is necessary to address climate change and mitigate its impacts on the environment and society.
